title: Adobe CJM ExperienceEvent - Message interaction details
description: Describes interaction made by the profile on the message.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Interaction Type
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Specify action made by user on a message.

meta:enum.click: Link in a message is clicked by the user.
meta:enum.open: Either Message is open by the user, or in case of push, clicking the message opened the mobile application.
meta:enum.action: Custom action taken on push notifcation, like clicking on some button in push notification.

@id.title: Tracker link ID
@id.description: Unique Identifier of the Link clicked by the user.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Link Label
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: The user-friendly label clicking on which the link opens.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Link Category
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: The category of the link. It may be `subscription`, or a user-defined category.
